nodes.text: A cyclic crystal array was a lightsaber attachment that allowed for the saber to hold multiple kyber crystals at the same time and switch between them at the press of a button. The attachment cost 1,500 credits, and was considered unorthodox.
Cyclic crystal arrays were mentioned in Gadgets and Gear, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
